questions.question: Tell me about a time you had to deal with a difficult team member or stakeholder.
questions.tips: Use STAR format. Focus on your actions and the positive outcome.

questions.question: Describe a situation where you had to meet a tight deadline. How did you handle it?
questions.tips: Emphasize prioritization, communication, and successful delivery.

questions.question: Tell me about a time you made a mistake at work. How did you handle it?
questions.tips: Show accountability, learning, and how you prevented recurrence.

questions.question: Describe a project you're most proud of. What was your role?
questions.tips: Quantify impact. Explain technical decisions and trade-offs.

questions.question: Tell me about a time you had to learn a new technology quickly.
questions.tips: Show your learning process and how you applied new knowledge.

questions.question: Describe a time when you disagreed with a technical decision. What did you do?
questions.tips: Show respectful communication, data-driven arguments, and flexibility.

questions.question: Tell me about a time you improved a process or system without being asked.
questions.tips: Demonstrate initiative and quantify the improvement.

questions.question: Describe how you've mentored or helped develop a junior team member.
questions.tips: Focus on your approach and their growth outcomes.

questions.question: Explain how you would design a URL shortening service like bit.ly.
questions.tips: Cover requirements, API design, database schema, and scaling.

questions.question: How would you design a rate limiter for an API?
questions.tips: Discuss algorithms (token bucket, sliding window), distributed considerations.

questions.question: Design a notification system that can send emails, SMS, and push notifications.
questions.tips: Cover message queues, retry logic, templates, and user preferences.

questions.question: How would you design a real-time chat application?
questions.tips: Discuss WebSockets, message persistence, presence, and scaling.

questions.question: Explain how you would optimize a slow database query.
questions.tips: Cover EXPLAIN, indexing, query rewriting, denormalization.

questions.question: What's the difference between SQL and NoSQL databases? When would you use each?
questions.tips: Discuss ACID vs BASE, schema flexibility, scaling patterns.

questions.question: Explain the concept of eventual consistency and when it's appropriate.
questions.tips: Cover CAP theorem, use cases, and trade-offs.

questions.question: How do you ensure code quality in your projects?
questions.tips: Discuss testing, code review, linting, CI/CD, documentation.

questions.question: Explain microservices architecture. What are its pros and cons?
questions.tips: Cover service boundaries, communication, deployment complexity.

questions.question: How would you handle missing data in a machine learning dataset?
questions.tips: Discuss imputation strategies, deletion, and impact on model.

questions.question: Explain the bias-variance tradeoff.
questions.tips: Use examples, discuss underfitting vs overfitting.

questions.question: How would you build a recommendation system?
questions.tips: Cover collaborative filtering, content-based, hybrid approaches.

questions.question: Describe your approach to feature engineering.
questions.tips: Discuss domain knowledge, feature selection, validation.

questions.question: How would you implement a CI/CD pipeline for a microservices application?
questions.tips: Cover build, test, deploy stages, rollback strategies.

questions.question: Explain how you would set up monitoring and alerting for a production system.
questions.tips: Discuss metrics, logs, traces, SLIs/SLOs, and on-call.

questions.question: What's your approach to infrastructure as code?
questions.tips: Cover Terraform/CloudFormation, state management, testing.

questions.question: How do you prioritize competing requests from different stakeholders?
questions.tips: Discuss frameworks, communication, and data-driven decisions.

questions.question: How do you handle underperforming team members?
questions.tips: Cover diagnosis, support, clear expectations, documentation.

questions.question: Describe how you've built or scaled an engineering team.
questions.tips: Cover hiring, onboarding, culture, and team structure.

questions.question: How do you balance technical debt with new feature development?
questions.tips: Discuss quantification, prioritization, and stakeholder communication.

questions.question: Why are you interested in this role/company?
questions.tips: Research the company. Connect your experience to their mission.

questions.question: Where do you see yourself in 5 years?
questions.tips: Show ambition aligned with realistic career growth.

questions.question: What's your biggest weakness?
questions.tips: Be genuine. Show self-awareness and improvement efforts.

questions.question: Tell me about yourself.
questions.tips: Give a 2-minute summary: background, key experiences, why this role.

categories.name: Behavioral
categories.description: Questions about past experiences and soft skills

categories.name: Technical
categories.description: Questions about technical knowledge and skills

categories.name: System Design
categories.description: Questions about designing systems and architecture
